qaauditheaders.scopeParagraph: Yorkmars suppliers must at all times produce good quality products that are safe, legal and fit for purpose. The effectiveness of all systems, processes and procedures required to produce good quality products must be regularly assessed to ensure they are operating effectively. Auditing by trained and experienced auditors is the most effective method to ensure effectiveness and identify areas of improvement. Effective auditing is the responsibility of an independent team of experienced Quality Management System Auditors.

auditlegend.mustHave: (1) Must have = Audit Rejected if not OK
auditlegend.levels: (2) Lev 1 to 4 = low to high concern
auditlegend.scoreDeduction: (3) Score from N/A requirements to be deducted from total possible score

qmsAudit.point_1_05_desc: Team Organization Structure Charts must be up to date and displayed in all employee areas.
qmsAudit.point_1_21_desc: To enable effective capacity planning, sewer performance and line balancing, the factory must have the ability to measure production line and factory efficiencies by operating Industrial Engineering processes.
qmsAudit.point_1_25_desc: Management should be able to demonstrate that all sewing operators have been trained according to the Operation Sequences and are able to effectively complete their task consistently and in the most efficient way.

fabricAudit.point_2_01_desc: All materials should remain in good condition and be clearly identified at all times.
fabricAudit.point_2_02_desc: All materials should be stored in a clean and tidy purposely built warehouse. Material storage should not be stored directly on the floor or within 50cms of any wall.
fabricAudit.point_2_03_title: Adherence to QMS for Material Handling
fabricAudit.point_2_03_desc: Management must be able to demonstrate adherence to the processes and procedures for receipt, testing and release to bulk production materials in accordance to the company QMS.
fabricAudit.point_2_05_desc: All materials must be clearly labelled with approval status for quantity, quality, size, and colour where applicable.
fabricAudit.point_2_06_desc: Completed Trim Cards should be clearly visible for easy identification of style specific materials, trims, accessories and components.
fabricAudit.point_2_07_desc: Management must be able to demonstrate clear Stock Control Systems, from receipt to issuance, in accordance to the company QMS.
fabricAudit.point_2_16_desc: The materials storage area must be dry, clean and tidy and the marked walkways must be kept clear at all times.
fabricAudit.point_2_17_desc: The lighting level must be acceptable in all working areas.
fabricAudit.point_2_18_desc: The aisles must be clear of any litter and adequate working areas provided for material store administration.
